title: Not a baby
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Why did the woman bring her baby to hospital?,
听录音，然后回答问题。这位女士为什么带她的宝宝去医院？

text_and_translation.text: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Why did the woman bring her baby to hospital?
text_and_translation.translation: 听录音，然后回答问题。这位女士为什么带她的宝宝去医院？
